conditional_rules: IF trigger IN ["any_event", "message", "reaction_added", "file_share", "app_mention"] THEN SHOW parameter 'watchWorkspace'
IF trigger IN ["any_event", "message", "reaction_added", "file_share", "app_mention"] AND watchWorkspace == True THEN SHOW parameter 'notice'
IF watchWorkspace == False THEN SHOW parameter 'channelId'
IF trigger IN ["any_event", "file_share"] THEN SHOW parameter 'downloadFiles'
